description:
The 66th Annual Primetime Emmy Awards celebrated every year to honor the outstanding in U.S. prime time television programs. The programs include from June 1, 2013 until May 31, 2014. Nominees are selected by the Academy of Television Arts & Sciences. Read on to learn more about the 66th Primetime Emmy Awards presenters.

This year, will be held on Monday, Augs 25, 2014 at the Nokia Theatre in Downtown Los Angeles, California. The ceremony is being held one month earlier than usual, because of NBC’s clash with the broadcast of Sunday Night Football. The ward show will be aired in the U.S. through NBC.

The date also circumvents a conflict with the 2014 MTV Video Music Awards. Late-night talk show host Seth Meyers, a well-known comedian from “Saturday Night Live,” will host the show for the first time.

Ahead of its schedule, the firs batch of awards presenters were already announced. Producers tapped the stars from “Breaking Bad,” “True Detective,” and “The Voice” to hand out the awards to winners at the awards ceremony.

As of now Executive producer Don Mischer announced 13 presenters including many of Oscar, Grammy, Golden Globe, and Tony winners. Some of the presenters are also nominated for an Emmy at the awards show.

Hollywood stars such as Halle Berry, Julia Roberts and fellow Emmy-nominated duo Matthew McConaughey and Woody Harrelson of HBO’s “True Detective” are set to present awards.

Other presenters include other Emmy nominees such as Bryan Cranston (“Breaking Bad“), Julia Louis-Dreyfus (“Veep“), Julianna Marguilies (“The Good Wife“), Jim Parsons (“The Big Bang Theory“), Kerry Washington (“Scandal“) and Amy Poehler (“Parks and Recreation“).

The complete list of the first batch of awards presenters:

Halle Berry
Bryan Cranston
Zooey Deschanel
Julia Louis-Dreyfus
Woody Harrelson
Adam Levine
Julianna Margulies
Matthew McConaughey
Jim Parsons
Amy Poehler
Julia Roberts
Gwen Stefani
Kerry Washington

北京时间8月12日，第66届“艾美奖”公布了首批颁奖嘉宾的名单，这其中大腕云集，而且很多颁奖嘉宾也是今年艾美奖的获奖热门。

在电视学院公布的艾美奖首批颁奖嘉宾名单中，其中就包括今年刚刚获得奥斯卡影帝荣誉的马修·麦康纳（Matthew McConaughey），同时他也将凭借HBO的罪案剧《真探》（True Detective）来竞逐艾美视帝；马修·麦康纳在《真探》中的搭档、同样获得视帝提名的伍迪·哈里森（Woody Harrelson）也在颁奖嘉宾之列；而AMC电视台神剧《绝命毒师》(观剧)（Breaking Bad）男主角布莱恩·克兰斯顿（Bryan Cranston），在竞逐视帝的同时也将作为颁奖嘉宾现身。

除了这三人以外，CBS电视台新剧《传世》（Extant）女主角哈莉·贝瑞（Halle Berry），Fox情景喜剧《杰茜驾到》（New Girl）女主角佐伊·丹斯切尔（Zooey Deschanel），真人秀节目《美国好声音(在线观看)》（The Voice）导师亚当·列维（Adam Levine），经典喜剧《生活大爆炸》（The Big Bang Theory）男主角吉姆·帕森斯（Jim Parsons），以及HBO喜剧《副总统》（Veep）女主角茱莉亚·路易斯-德瑞弗斯（Julia Louis-Dreyfus）也都将担任颁奖嘉宾。其中，吉姆·帕森斯和德瑞弗斯也将在本届艾美奖上竞逐喜剧类视帝和视后的荣誉。

其他的颁奖嘉宾还包括NBC喜剧《公园与休憩》（Parks and Recreation）的女主角艾米·波勒（Amy Poehler），曾经获得奥斯卡桂冠、本届艾美奖上凭借《平常心》（The Normal Heart）获得提名的著名影星茱莉亚·罗伯茨（Julia Roberts），ABC剧集《丑闻》（Scandal）女主角凯莉·华盛顿（Kerry Washington），CBS电视台剧集《傲骨贤妻》(观剧)（The Good Wife）女主角朱莉安娜·玛格丽丝（Julianna Margulies），以及《美国好声音》的新晋导师格温·史蒂芬妮（Gwen Stefani）。

美国当地时间8月25日，第66届艾美奖就将举行颁奖盛典，主持人是美国著名脱口秀主持人塞斯·梅耶斯（Seth Meyers）。(腾讯娱乐）
